attributes.action: request of Microsoft to create British English language versions of its software.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Microsoft software is the standard in almost all fields where computers are used. It provides different language versions for for many languages, but not British English. Most children will use Windows or other products, and they will see American English spellings such as "Personalize" and "color", and assume them to be correct in this country. Countries with far smaller populations and even regions within countries, such as Catalonia, are provided with translations yet our entire nation is overlooked.
